tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We went to Dr.Sudha for our initial pregnancy check up as we are expecting. Before reaching out there, we have checked reviews and had a check on the clinic and thought that the clinic is small. But, we made into the clinic yesterday evening and actually got amazed that there is an entire LAB setup inside the clinic including Scanning and ultrasound. 

As it is my first pregnancy, we have listed multiple queries at our home to ask the doctor, but what suprised me is that - I did not got a  need to ask any question as she explained all the issues and care-abouts well before we asked the queries.  At that moment, we understood that we are at the right place.

 We also got the UltraSound test done by Dr.Sudha itself rather than a lab technician and the report is explained well to us which built up confidence in us. Scanning price is very reasonable when compared to other hospitals. 
She gave ample time for discussion with a pleasant smile and did not rush at any moment. I was worried about finding a good gyenic*** *** *** * ***** *** **** *** ** ***** Thank you doc. 
-Sirisha seepana
reply_text: thank you very much Sirisha...take care

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Doctor is very friendly and open to respond on our health issues and general queries. Will recommend to consult Doctor here for your health issues without any doubt.---But the front end staff and blood test department is very reluctant. They are delaying to give the report. It is more than 2 days, on top of it they say the blood sample collected was not sufficient to give the report. They did not inform that either, I have called them for the report and they say this. don't recommend diagnostic service here..
reply_text: Thank you Balaji garu for your response. Definitely will sort out the issue with the diagnostic service

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
Doctor is very friendly in nature.  Explains the health issue clearly. Prescribes limited medication what is needed. Patiently listen to the problems when we are explaining, and clear our myths with detailed explanation. 
I recommend this doctor for all gynaecology issues or infertility treatment. I take this forum as an opportunity to thank Dr. Sudha once again.

tags: Doctor friendliness,
review: A very caring, polite, helpful and attentive doctor who listens to the patient and gives *********** solutions. I am visiting her for my pregnancy check ups and I am very happy with her treatment. Thank you so much doctor Sudha for your support and coordination

tags: None
review: I went to sri sudha clinic  for irregular periods  and was diagnosed  as having pcos.i was really worried  about it.but dr.sudha counselled me regarding  the problem.she told about changes in my life style.i started  treatment.i am happy  with her  way of approach.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I referred my Brother's Daughter to See the Dr Sudha after the Rating in Practo, Really They had a great time with Her, Such a friendly Doctor and Explained very well, Best part is She is taken care of the patient health by Suggesting the food. Now a days we had some expensive experiences with so many doctors and Not here, Good Response and Great Service, The Support Staff is also friendly and Kudos to them😊😊
reply_text: Thank you for your kind words

tags: None
review: Hi one of know relation suggested me and I also searched in practo and impressed with reviews as so many already told it was small clinic but having all the set up and the enivironment around is so cool and doctor is very friendly and she don't hurry the patient and listen to the problem and suggest as per the problem I really felt very comfortable .I went for. Early pregency scan .thanks to sudha mam for valuable suggestions

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
After searching so many doctors luckily I found
Dr. Sudha Mam on practo. She is very good at listening to our problems and she gives detailed information of the problem. And she explains about the medicines and how we will be benefitted by the same.

I highly recommend Dr. Sudha for gynae related problems.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I am happy that all the equipment is readily available to diagnose the problem in hospital itself. In some other place I found myself in a place where I have to run to some other diagnostic centre to get my tests done and make another appointment to get treated. But here it is not like that, Dr. Sudha did scanning there itself and resolved my problem carefully without any lag. She is really friendly and gave support that everything will be alright. The staff is also friendly and helpful with the appointment tracking. Hospital is hygiene and well maintained.
reply_text: Thank you for your detailed review.. hope this would be helpful for the viewers
